concept.title: Types of custom PDF plug-ins
concept.shortdesc: There are two common types of plug-ins: A plug-in that simply sets the DITA-OT parameters to be used when a PDF is generated, and a plug-in that overrides aspects of the base DITA-OT PDF transformation. A plug-in can, of course, do both of these things.

section.title: Plug-in that only provides DITA-OT parameters
section.p: You might want to build a transformation type that uses a transformation as-is; however, you might want to ensure that certain DITA-OT parameters are used. For an example of this approach, see .
